title: End Game Additional option "Never be teamed with _____"
body: I would really love a feature where i can actually completely STOP the ability to be queued in the same team as another summoner, I honestly lose so many games due to getting the same incompetent player/troll and it's making climbing ranked so hard. I can win 7 games straight get into promos, then get the same troll retard and lose them. It's honestly getting on my nerves an insane amount and a feature where i can just stop that from happening more than twice from the same person would be really nice. Thanks!

replies.body: This would not be difficult from a technical standpoint - all you'd need to is compile the list of 10 players as usual, but send the list of your teammates to each player's clients along with the request to confirm or refuse the game, and have the client refuse the game automatically if somebody on your Troll List is among those 4 players.

Except for the fact that it means if your playing ranked it becomes an abuse tool and you just add to the ban list players that are good (aiming to get only bad players in the game) or bad (aiming to get only good players on your team).

Honestly OP just needs to learn to wait out of queue after a game, it really isn't that hard but a lot of people seem to not understand that it's the simplest thing for this sort of stuff.

"Honestly OP just needs to learn to wait out of queue after A GAME, it really isn't that hard but a lot of people seem to not understand that it's the simplest thing for this sort of stuff."

If you actually read the thread properly i id mention that i get queued with the same trolls/people rather often, not game after game, but day after day, they clearly play in the same time frame as me so it's only natural that we get paired together from time to time... {{summoner:3}}
Friend them, never queue at the same time, but unless you play only in off time you shouldn't always get the same people.
I play in off time often

It could not be used to avoid good players on the opposing team because the server would only tell you the 4 other players on your team, not all 9 other players in the game. If Joe McAwesome is on your Troll List, this would only make it so you are never on Joe McAwesome's team, it would not prevent him playing against you.
Then again, you just ban every bad player you ever play with, instantly turns into a case of abuse.
Hmmm a case of abuse... Oh you  mean like how you can report people for verbal abuse/harassment and all it takes is a few reports and you're chat banned without reason?
No a case of abuse as in you can use it to avoid just generally bad players to win more games.

Yeah i understand there is some flaws in it being a complete ban against them being in your team, i guess adding a sort of soft cap to this like, one person a day that you can block or something like that? Would be a tough one to control the abuse it could bring about, but considering how many people play this game, unless you're playing ay 2am or have a problem with ~3min queues instead of two, shouldn't really be a problem, not that i can see anyway.
[League client] is not your personal army
Yeah this feature would be good for the player, but not the community itself. I'd end up blocking every feeder I meet. There are some problems with this idea.
Doesn't blocking a player lessen your chance of being teamed up with them?

Hahaha I can imagine if this was implemented and all the boosted trash would be spamming threads asking Riot to remove it because they can't find games 8)

Honestly doe this would end the boosting/acc buying business.

EDIT: Xbox have a system where you can select players you've vsed recently and make them a preferred player or an avoided one and all it does it make it more or less likely to play with that person again.

Good idea. I doubt Riot would be able to make it so you are never ever matched with a certain person, because if you used it on too many people sometimes matchmaking could take too long, maybe. However, if they made the likelihood of you playing with them 1% instead of 50% (I know those figures are incorrect, but just using them for examples), I would greatly appreciate it.

Yeah I do not understand why you can get teamed with someone you have blocked. 

I don't mind new players, but trolls are just not right, some people go afk because ONE minion got taken by the jungler. Do I want to play with those people? Even if you pay me I still won't.
good idea, but there are something that may not work with it.
